void recursion_loop(int count){
  printf("Count: %d\n", count);
  if (count == 0) {return;}
  recursion_loop(count - 1);
}

int main(){
  recursion_loop(100000);
  return 0;
}

def recursion_loop(count)
  puts("Count: #{count}")
  return if count == 0
  recursion_loop(count - 1)
end

/**
 * @param {string} s
 * @return {boolean}
 */
var isValid = function(s) {
    s = s.replace(/\(/g, '+(');
    s = s.replace(/\[/g, '+[');
    s = s.replace(/\{/g, '+{0:');
    s = s.replace(/\)/g, '+0)');
    s = s.replace(/\]/g, '+0]');
    s = s.replace(/\}/g, '+0}');
    try{
        eval(s);
    } catch(err) {
        return false;
    }
    return true;
};
